tweet: Toured the USCGC John McCormick at @USCG Base Ketchikan, alongside @ComdtUSCG Schultz and congressional colleagues. I oversee #CoastGuard funding as #DHS @AppropsDems Chairwoman, and visits like this are essential to my assessments of the #USCG's missions and priorities. pic.twitter.com/Oz652AOzJx

Proud to address our incredible #CoastGuard at Air Station #Kodiak, where my congressional colleagues and I learned the latest news about #USCG’s efforts to perform emergency rescues and save lives. pic.twitter.com/jCxSqwH72R

Hoy celebramos el 54 aniversario de #Medicare & #Medicaid. Estos programas han ayudado y continúan ayudando a millones de personas mayores, niños, y personas con discapacidades. Debemos expandir y proteger estos programas sociales. pic.twitter.com/tsSuf3fvUp

#Medicare & #Medicaid have helped older Americans, women, children, & the disabled for 54 years. They must be preserved for future generations, and @HouseDemocrats will keep fighting to protect these programs. #ForThePeople pic.twitter.com/0zGSj5hi30

I'm proud to oversee @USCoastGuard funding as #DHS @AppropsDems Chairwoman, and right now I'm personally surveying #CoastGuard resources & priorities. Today, we joined @ComdtUSCG Schultz aboard the USCGC Healy for a briefing on Arctic missions & international traffic in the area. pic.twitter.com/P7QqnjoMKa

My heart goes out to the victims and survivors of the horrific shooting at California's #Gilroy Garlic Festival. Our House Majority has passed sensible, bipartisan #GunSafety legislation to help #EndGunViolence; how many more mass shootings will it take for @SenateGOP to join us?
As DHS @AppropsDems Chairwoman, I'm fighting for sensible & humane border policies that truly keep us safe and treat all people humanely, immigrants & law enforcement alike. #NoTrumpWall

The Court is wrong to let Trump bypass Congress and build a costly, ineffective border wall. The Constitution grants all funding authority to us, the Congress, not SCOTUS or POTUS! The Trump Wall won't keep us safe or fix our broken immigration system. https://www.cnn.com/2019/07/26/politics/supreme-court-pentagon-border-wall-construction/index.html …

As a new @Smithsonian Regent, I enjoyed my conversation today with Smithsonian Secretary Lonnie Bunch! We discussed ways to make the #Smithsonian more accessible to ALL families across the country, and to share the many educational resources the Smithsonian has to offer. pic.twitter.com/6b9Ba0rNpY

As #DHS @AppropsDems chairwoman, I pressed @ICEgov Acting Dir. Albence today about many issues, including #ICE's failure to stay within the budget that Congress has approved. I want to be clear: When Congress passes appropriations bills, they aren't suggestions -- they are LAW. pic.twitter.com/LkoDtyCs31

When I chaired today's #DHS @AppropsDems questioning of @ICEgov Acting Dir. Albence, I told him that we will continue to fiercely oppose cruel and exclusionary #immigration policies being pushed by the Trump Administration, while also continuing our work to keep Americans safe. pic.twitter.com/NI4Q6LKRD7

If we can expand mothers’ access to midwives’ evidence-based, holistic, and woman-centered care, we will improve maternity care outcomes for mothers and babies, and reduce maternity care costs for America’s families and for our state and local governments. https://roybal-allard.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=401613 …

Very saddened by the passing of Henry Lozano. Henry was chief of staff to my late father, Rep. Edward R. Roybal, and served as a mentor & advisor to countless Latino public servants and community leaders. He will be sorely missed. My heartfelt condolences to his family & friends.

These are not young people who are threats to our communities or to our nation.  To think that one day, a young man is a child in a facility like Homestead, and the next day he's taken away in handcuffs by ICE?  That's TOTALLY outrageous.

A shocking fact: On our tour of the Homestead facility, we learned that when a young man in the facility turns 18, ICE comes on his birthday, picks him up, HANDCUFFS him, and transports him to an ADULT detention facility...

Just returned from an @AppropsDems visit to Florida's Homestead shelter for migrant children. It was a COMPLETELY inappropriate place for kids. Our govt must eliminate "influx facilities" like Homestead and find sponsors for the kids (preferably their parents or other family). pic.twitter.com/fpf0AOriRE

Many children in CBP custody have endured long and traumatic journeys to the United States. This #FourthOfJuly, as we celebrate America’s 243rd birthday with food and fireworks, let’s also reaffirm that we all have a role to play in building an America that honors our bedrock commitments to equal rights, liberty, and justice for all. https://www.latimes.com/local/california/la-tr-fireworks-fourth-of-july-2019-los-angeles-20190702-story.html …

An agreement between HHS and DHS has led to traumatic and prolonged separations of migrant children from their families. My colleagues and I call on these agencies to rescind their agreement, and ensure children can be released from government custody and placed in loving homes. https://twitter.com/HomelandDems/status/1146505168432881665 …

Thanks to @LauraDern & @MonicaRamirezDC for supporting my CARE Act (HR 3394) to finally ensure child farmworkers have the same federal labor protections as other children. It is long past time for us to stand up for the well-being of children working in agriculture. https://twitter.com/TheHillOpinion/status/1146445242075189248 …

As DHS Appropriations Chairwoman, I am doing everything in my power to stop the Trump Administration's horrifically cruel immigration policies. Every man, woman & child has dignity, no matter where they come from. America must offer them the fair & humane treatment they deserve.

Every American should be outraged and disgusted by the Trump Administration's brutal treatment of migrants. The new DHS IG report from US border facilities echoes what I've seen myself: Crowds of migrants—including little children!—packed together in utterly inhuman conditions. https://twitter.com/nprpolitics/status/1146437217231020035 …

Mr. President, you cannot pick and choose which Supreme Court decisions apply to your administration and which do not. You are NOT above the law. #NoCitizenshipQuestion https://www.nytimes.com/2019/07/03/us/politics/census-citizenship-question.html …

Great to catch up with my friend Frank Cruz, an inspiring and barrier-breaking #Latino journalist, business leader, educator, and author!  I was privileged to write the foreword to his new memoir, and he presented me with a signed copy. pic.twitter.com/GtFuo6T80O

I dropped by #Maywood’s El Cafecito to congratulate owner Laura Barajas on her business’s recent grand opening, where she received this Certificate of Congressional Recognition from my office! (During my visit, I also enjoyed some *delicious* cafe de olla & pastries.) #ShopLocal pic.twitter.com/2sLjtVtr2N

The #2020Census must not be the victim of sabotage, and our House Democratic Majority will not rest in protecting it. We must fight back against misinformation and other attacks that could lead to an illegal undercount of our communities.

The threat of a #CitizenshipQuestion on the #2020Census has already intimidated many residents, and we must keep working to ensure that our neighbors, our friends, our families, and ourselves are counted in the #Census.

The news that there won't be a #CitizenshipQuestion on the #2020Census is a crucial win for our democracy, but we must stay on our guard. https://roybal-allard.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=401606 …

In a massive victory for our #Census, our democracy, our country, and #ForThePeople, the Trump Administration has finally agreed to print the #2020Census without the administration’s unconstitutional #CitizenshipQuestion. https://www.latimes.com/politics/la-na-pol-census-trump-citizenship-20190702-story.html …

Toured the #HuntingtonPark WIC Center and spoke with its leaders about the center's Special Supplemental Nutrition Program services for local families. Also discussed our shared commitment to ensuring our 40th District families eat well, keep active, and stay healthy. #WIC pic.twitter.com/jdcTgAR07V

I’m proud to have introduced the Seniors Have Eyes, Ears, and Teeth Act, which would clear the way for #seniors on #Medicare to get the vision, hearing, and dental care they need! We must do all we can to ensure a healthy and comfortable future for our seniors.

Glad to speak with seniors at the #Maywood Senior Center about how my office can help them deal with #Medicare, #SocialSecurity, & other federal programs! As congresswoman for our 40th District, I’m working day & night to protect our #seniors’ benefits & advocate for their needs. pic.twitter.com/d9XT5xoKYD

The DHS inspector general is now investigating this racist, sexist, and violent Border Patrol Facebook group.
